name: PixelCatch
description:
Hello, everybody

I am a student in the 4th year of apprenticeship. I don't have an apprenticeship as a computer scientist or similar.

In the context of a project work, I developed this game without much knowledge of game engines and programming.
With the help of free and public resources, I developed this game.

All of the content of the game is self-designed and programmed.

In the editor you will find the instructions and goal of the game.

Have fun!
